sourcesContent:
Books

  • {{

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from '../shared/book'; @Component({ selector: 'bm-book-list', templateUrl: './book-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./book-list.component.css'] }) export class BookListComponent { books: Book[] = []; constructor() { this.books = [ { isbn: '12345', title: 'Tierisch gut kochen', authors: ['Mrs Chimp', 'Mr Gorilla'], published: '2022-06-20', subtitle: 'Rezepte von Affe bis Zebra', thumbnailUrl: 'https://cdn.ng-buch.de/kochen.png', description: 'Immer lecker und gut' }, { isbn: '67890', title: 'Backen mit Affen', authors: ['Orang Utan'], published: '2022-07-15', subtitle: 'Bananenbrot und mehr', thumbnailUrl: 'https://cdn.ng-buch.de/backen.png', description: 'Tolle Backtipps für Mensch und Tier' } ]; } }
